original_title: Most Disturbed Person On Planet Earth
overview: The footage you are about to see is an electronic documentation of the worlds most darkest, obscene and shocking media. This film has been created to prove that my infamous name is not a joke. I set out to create the most disturbing place of media in the world and believe I have succeeded.
tagline: I am the most disturbed person on planet earth.
title: Most Disturbed Person On Planet Earth
